jobs.name: Pipeline every minute
jobs.command: sudo -i ubuntu cd $HOME/app_portfolio && git pull && sudo systemctl restart app_portfolio && sudo systemctl restart app_portfolio_microservice_batch

jobs.name: Pipeline 08.00 every day
jobs.command: sudo -i ubuntu cd $HOME/app_portfolio && git pull && sudo systemctl restart app_portfolio && sudo systemctl restart app_portfolio_microservice_batch

jobs.name: Pipeline 12.00 every day
jobs.command: sudo -i ubuntu cd $HOME/app_portfolio && git pull && sudo systemctl restart app_portfolio && sudo systemctl restart app_portfolio_microservice_batch

jobs.name: Pipeline 17.00 every day
jobs.command: sudo -i ubuntu cd $HOME/app_portfolio && git pull && sudo systemctl restart app_portfolio && sudo systemctl restart app_portfolio_microservice_batch

jobs.name: Pipeline 16.00 every friday
jobs.command: sudo -i ubuntu cd $HOME/app_portfolio && git pull && sudo systemctl restart app_portfolio && sudo systemctl restart app_portfolio_microservice_batch
